description: Zaidan Arrafif is a daily journal entry and Qur'an memorizing android app with gamification for Zaidan Educare Elementary School. This app won first place in POLBAN student scientific week 2021 category of PKM-PM.

OpenCommiss is an open commission art platform as the subject of my diploma final project in POLBAN. The platform is also integrated with payment gateway Xendit. I responsible for building the backend and my friend built the frontend using react js
